title: Senior ML Engineer - AI Services
description:
Schibsted Media is a family of well-known media brands across Norway, Sweden and Finland. Our winning ambition is to be the leading media destination in Nordics. To reach our ambition we strive to offer the best and most relevant products in the media industry, making it even more attractive for readers, listeners, viewers, and advertisers to engage with our universe.
   

  

 Data and AI is the central organisation within Schibsted Media that is responsible for its data platform, and builds data and AI products with emphasis on volume, velocity and privacy that serve the whole of Schibsted Media and its brands.
   

  

 AI Services is a team within Data&AI that is currently responsible for developing and maintaining machine learning models that are empowering many use cases in Schibsted such as: producing insights and analytics about our customers, segments for the online advertising on our sites and personalization of news. We are working with big amounts of data from newspapers (like VG, Aftenposten, Aftonbladet, Bergens Tidene) and we are also looking for new ways to enhance user experience by adding new capabilities to our portfolio, which include working with content data and other exciting opportunities.
   

  

**We are looking for an experienced ML Engineer** 
 , who is independent, goal oriented and loves working with Big Data. We practise a product-oriented mindset, so you will be working alongside the product management team to find the best solutions to meet the needs of our internal stakeholders.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Contribute to analysis, design, building, training, evaluation, shipping and refinement of ML-driven products to solve real-world problems
* Collaborate closely with a cross-functional agile team spanning data science, product management, and engineering to build prototypes as well as production-ready solutions
* Engage with internal stakeholders and end-users to better understand their needs, as well as explain, educate, and support them in ML matters
* Provide guidance to more junior team members


**What is our technology stack?**
* Data Processing: Luigi/Spark/Scala -> Flyte/PySpark/Python. We are currently in the process of migration, consider the latter to be the future, however you might be required to work with some of the older pipelines before they are migrated
* Machine Learning: Tensorflow, Pytorch
* Infrastructure: Docker, Kubernetes as a main platform for both processing and services, AWS as cloud provider (S3, EKS)


**Job Requirements**
* You have at least a Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Applied Mathematics, or any quantitative field
* 3+ years of related industry experience in the data science domain and a deep understanding of AI and machine learning methods and algorithms
* You have great communication skills, can communicate complex concepts in a simple way, and articulate solutions to other team members and non-technical people
* Solid knowledge of Python with the ability to write performant production-quality code, other programming languages are a bonus
* Experience working with Pandas, Transformers and Tensorflow/Keras or Pytorch
* Experience working with Spark, Databricks or other big data technologies
* Experience working with Kubernetes and AWS (or any other cloud provider)


 As a part of Schibsted, you will also have the opportunity to share knowledge and learn from other data engineers across the organisation. We encourage a diverse, collaborative and creative work environment, where you will develop and push for state-of-the-art solutions in big data processing as well as building reliable and highly scalable services.

title: Solution Developer to Fund and Portfolio Services | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we are innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Our ambitious data roadmap is growing, and we are now looking for a Solution Developer to join our Reporting team within Fund and Portfolio Services.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 In this role, you will be a part of our Investment Management domain. We deliver fund and portfolio services supporting the Investment Management division. This domain is undergoing an exciting transformation driven by customer demands for excellent digital service and technological advancements. Our solutions are used both by external customer segments and other domains, with the target to ensure that we have flexible, modern, and sustainable solutions, to enable our customers to reach their goals.
   

  

 As a Solution Developer, you will work with regulatory and business-related development in our high-priority Fund and Portfolio area. Here you will get the chance to create value by providing stakeholders with business-critical data. You will be involved in an exciting initiative where we are currently developing a new data warehouse solution in the cloud to optimize and support our business. You will belong to our cross-functional team in which you will work with requirements, test, development, and deployment and have a dialogue with stakeholders around the solutions. In addition, you will also guide other developers in the team by coaching, performing code reviews, and being involved in design decisions, etc.
   

  

**Your responsibilities:**
* Work with .NET-based Microservices and Cloud solutions.
* You will be involved in the ongoing development, maintenance, and support of our existing and future business systems and integrations.
* Ensure solutions adhere to SEB’s guidelines and meet regulatory and security standards.
* Guide the team's development activities and assist in work breakdown and effort estimation through agile methodologies.
* Coach the team to deliver value by helping them solve problems and remove impediments, escalate when necessary, and manage risks and dependencies.
* Drive, lead, and innovate technical development aligned with Target Architecture and SEB vision to ensure future scalability and adaptability.
* Work in a modern, agile way and contribute with your competence and code to the bank’s digital transformation.
* Collaborate closely with the business and other teams within SEB.
* Participate in workshops and communities.
* Drive good engineering practices within your team and spread this with the development community.
* Stay up to date on design patterns, technical trends, and enablers.
* Assess existing technical solutions in their relevance and identify the need of technical-driven and life cycle activities.


**Who We Are Looking For**
* Have experience in software development with C# .NET, MS SQL, APIs
* Have experience in leading and mentoring teams in daily activities.
* Have excellent leadership skills and a drive for innovation and change.
* Have experience with Kubernetes and OpenShift
* Experience with public cloud solutions on Google Cloud Platform
* Have experience with Git, GitHub, and CI/CD.
* Data integration & data management in the Cloud
* Excellent problem-solving skills and a drive to find the best solutions.
* Familiar with API & Event based architecture.
* Are fluent in English.
* Enjoy working by agile methodologies for example SAFe agile framework.


**Any experience with the following will be advantageous:**
* MQ
* Monitoring and alerting
* Other Cloud providers
* React
* Typescripts
* Javascript


 We are looking for a person who shows interest and respect for others, is a team player with a positive and open mindset, and enjoys coaching other team members. You excel in coordination, are proactive in addressing significant issues, and strive by taking initiative. You always focus on delivering customer values and enjoy supporting your team by delivering knowledge and guidance in the technical vision.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is a nuance to every individual's career development, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Extensive training and learning opportunities.
* Access to SEB staff banking and exclusive benefits.
* A varying position where you will be part of building our new platform as well as take end-to-end responsibility for the regulatory use cases.
* A prestigious team with experienced colleagues who value cooperation and openness.
* Opportunity to share knowledge by pair programming, demos, etc.
* A workplace where we care about the work-life balance.
* An innovative company at the forefront of technology
* Hybrid Workplace Setup


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Even though we will start the interview phase first at the end of August, we recommend that you apply today and not later than the 28th of August.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact Hülya Heggli, Team Manager, at hulya.heggli@seb.se or Rasmus Hallberg, Talent Acquisition Partner, at rasmus.hallberg@seb.se
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB here:** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career

title: Account Executive
description:
**A startup without risk? In this climate?🤔**
 Lime Go is a startup unit, part of Lime Technologies Sweden AB (publ), without financial risk for you as an individual. This will give you the opportunity to join a hungry team that moves fast, yet still have the luxury of working at a publicly listed company with excellent track records, year over year.
   

  

**What we’re looking for?🤓**
* Proven experience selling complex products/services for at least 2+ years (bonus if SaaS)
* You are hungry, curious and want to join our scaleup-journey
* Excellent communication and interpersonal capabilities
* Top notch problem solving skills
* You want to deliver sales results for ~1 year and if job well done be able to step into a role with combined responsibility related to sales management/coaching/leadership/reporting. At Lime, we believe in leaders who have a proven track record in sales!


**Your role being a part of our team?** 
 👨🏻‍🤝‍👨🏻
   

  

* Responsible for the whole sales process, from prospecting to closing & handover
* Target our ICP across multiple industries and regions
* Be creative in how to build your sales pipe, through omnichannel outreach and inbound leads
* Tailor our Sales CRM to the customer needs and demo it to potential customers online, and if reasonable, physically!
* Negotiate to win bigger and better deals faster - to crush your budget


**The product?🤑**
 Lime Go is a Data Enriched Sales CRM for small and medium-sized businesses in the Nordics. We target sales teams so you will be convincing similar personas on why our product is awesome! Currently, we have 1000 customers in Sweden, Norway & Denmark but our goal is to be the obvious choice for ambitious companies in all over Europe.
   

  

 Recently, we finished a full rewamp project for Lime Go, which means you’ll be selling a modern, fresh & powerful product.
   

  

**The Lime Go team today?‍👨🏻‍🤝‍👨🏻**
 We are an ambitious team of 15 people with aggressive growth goals the coming years. Confident in reaching those goals, we’d love to have you onboard as a key corner stone of our team.
   

  

**Requirements?**
* 2+ years of SaaS sales
* Minimum a Bachelor's degree 🎓
* Drivers license 🚙
* You want to come into the office at Kungsbroplan in Stockholm 🎈
* Du snackar flytande svenska - and you speak English🎭
* A proven resume being excellent in sales 📈


 You'll be reporting to Max (Director & Sales Manager) and be part of our Go-To-Market team of 12 people.
   

  

**Benefits & other things?💸**
 We offer a competitive base salary and
 *variable commission model with kicker levels when above budget* 
 . Also, we have a stock savings program. You’ll get generous employee benefits such as company trips, 6 weeks of vacation, pension, monthly pubs, merch, wellness allowance, terminal glasses, CBA (collective bargain agreement), a sponsored run if you're wearing Lime merch etc.
   

  

 During the ride, we’ll have a good laugh and do a bunch of team activities. Apply now to join our journey - Europe awaits!
   

  

**The process, step by step? 💻**
* First off, you’ll get on a screening call with a person on the team
* Interview
* Case assignment to show off your skills - pitch our product!
* After that, you will have a more in depth-interview with one or multiple people at Lime
* References
* Agreement walkthrough
* Last but not least, you get to meet the final boss - Lime Group CEO (Nils) ;)


 Don’t hesitate to drop your application or reach out to us if you have any questions. We look forward talking to you!
   

  

 Let’s Go!

title: Lösningsarkitekt inom Financial Services
description:
***Ditt ledarskap och din vision ger våra kunder ett försprång i vår gemensamma resa mot mer hållbar teknik och ökad digitalisering.***




  





**Blue Harvest** 




  





 Inom
 **Blue Harvest** 
 är vår ambition att göra skillnad genom att skapa en miljö som främjar tillväxt och kreativt tänkande. Som en del av Capgemini, är vi ett snabbt växande internationellt mjukvarukonsultföretag. I Stockholm består
 **Blue Harvest teamet** 
 av engagerade kollegor med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter och vi arbetar med de största bank- och försäkringsbolagen. Tillsammans med kollegor från bland annat Belgien, Nederländerna och Tyskland levererar vi innovativa projekt till stora kunder över hela Europa.
 



  





**I rollen hos oss får du:** 




  




* Driva innovation genom teknisk expertis.
* Fungera som rådgivare mot ledningen och seniora intressenter och bygga strategiskt partnerskap hos våra kunder.
* Möjliggöra leveranser tillsammans med våra tvärfunktionella team.
* Bli en den del av en kultur som präglas av emotionell intelligens, mentorskap och tillväxtmöjligheter.



  





**Vi är nyfikna på att höra din historia och se vilka erfarenheter du besitter. Berätta för oss om:** 




  




* Något projekt du jobbat med inom lösningsarkitektur som du är extra stolt över.
* Dina framgångar och utmaningar i att stötta ett team.
* Din tekniska och praktisk erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, Cloud och/eller dataarkitektur.
* Din erfarenhet av att jobba med exempelvis DevOps, integration och kontinuerlig leverans.
* Din syn på för- och nackdelar med att arbeta i en agil miljö.



  





**Get the future you want:** 




  





 För oss är delaktighet och gemenskapen viktig och vi ses så ofta vi kan för gemensamma aktiviteter som lunchträffar, afterworks och kompetensutbyte. Vi stödjer dig med kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling, certifieringar och intressanta kunduppdrag för en gedigen karriärutveckling. Samarbete, tillit och en stödjande arbetskultur är centralt för oss inom Blue Harvest.
 



  





**Ansökan:** 




  





 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss. Vi inleder våra processer med att prata om vad du är intresserad av att göra som nästa steg och vi är genuint nyfikna över vilka faktorer som får dig att trivas på jobbet.

title: Sustainability Platform Manager / Project Manager
description:
*Do you want to be part of a leading Nordic sustainability scaleup whilst contributing to the global corporate sustainability transition? Position Green is in a strong scaleup phase and we are looking for new amazing talents to join our Customer Success team.*
**About Position Green**
 Position Green is a leading pure play sustainability partner with a mission to revolutionise how businesses integrate sustainability. Through our SaaS software for data management, strategic advisory and e-learning services, Position Green’s offering makes sustainability actionable and measurable, supporting businesses to fast-track their sustainability transformation whilst also strengthening their competitiveness and long-term survival. We come from the Nordics but we operate across the globe in supporting our customers to navigate and succeed in corporate sustainability.
   

  

 We are excited to offer the opportunity to be part of our journey in the role of Sustainability Platform Manager, working in a discipline with a crucial impact on Position Green’s business growth.
   

  

**About The Role**
 In the role of Sustainability Platform Manager, you will have the main responsibility for helping our customers get the most value out of our platform and is responsible for the overall satisfaction of the customer and its growth and transformation journey. To be able to achieve this, you work closely with both the product and the customer. Reporting to our CS Team lead, you will be part of a team full of knowledge, ambition and fun. There will also be great development opportunities when you join the company at an early stage.
   

  

**As a Sustainability Platform Manager, you will mainly:**
* Build and maintain strong and long-lasting customer relationships by working proactively with our customers
* Support in sustainability related matters according to the customers' needs.
* Driving meetings throughout the transformation process.
* Continuously working with additional sales together with the Account Manager by paying attention to the customers' needs and new selling opportunities.
* Be prepared to work with all existing tasks in an entrepreneurial and fast-growing company.


**What are we looking for?**
* Experience in project management or customer success management, preferably from a SaaS environment
* You have a degree (BSc minimum) within a relevant field such as business, economics, environmental studies or similar
* Knowledge within calculations of greenhouse gas emissions and emission factors
* Knowledge within sustainability reporting according to common standards such as GRI, GHG Protocol, CDP or TCFD
* You're fluent in English and Swedish, both written and spoken


 To thrive in this role, we believe that you enjoy driving your own projects and see the importance of your delivery meeting the customers' needs. You have the ability to manage stakeholders in a fast moving context, and you are used to working in several work streams at the same time.
   

  

 As a person, you have a positive attitude, are curious and have a sense of humor. You are a doer who thrives on delving into details as well as truly understanding and delivering according to the customer's needs. You look forward to working in a growing team that triggers each other to great deeds and is driven by contributing to a positive change.
   

  

**Location**
 We believe that you are based in the greater Stockholm or Malmö region.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 As our new colleague here at Position Green you get to be an important part of a fast-paced and fun scale up environment. We offer you a great opportunity to grow as a person as well as in your career. You get to work in a company where you can have great impact and drive sustainable transformation in business and organisations.
   

  

 You’ll get fair compensation and benefits, including:
   

  

* Wellness allowance of 5 000 SEK/year
* 30 vacation days + 5 extra PG days
* Flexible working hours and hybrid work option


**What’s next?**
 If this sounds like a great opportunity for you, we will be happy to receive your CV. In this recruitment, great importance is placed on personal suitability.
   

  

 We will be reviewing applications on a continuous basis and looking forward to your application.
   

  

* Position Green Group is the Nordic leader in sustainability software and consulting.
* Supports 500+ customers worldwide.
* 300+ employees with expertise within strategy, communication, software development, environmental studies, engineering and social sciences.
* Awarded and recognized as one of the leading tech scaleups in the Nordics by Techarenan, Deloitte, Norrsken Impact Summit, Cleantech Scandinavia and Breakit.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
At Schibsted Media, our newsrooms have made significant progress in developing AI solutions to improve editorial workflows. To build on this success, we at SPP are establishing a new team dedicated to creating a robust foundation for scaling AI integrations in our tools, particularly our Create CMS.
   

  

**Who Are We in SPP?**
 Shared Products & Platforms (SPP) offers a powerful suite of tools for newsrooms and journalists within Schibsted Media and to external partners. SPP supports the entire editorial process with advanced tools, enhancing content distribution by leveraging new technologies. From planning and discovery to creation and personalised recommendations in text, video, and sound, SPP meets the needs of modern media operations.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a talented Full Stack Engineer with a strong AI focus to join our newly formed AI Team in SPP. This expert team will consist of two full stack engineers and one product manager. Your initial mission will be to design and implement a solid foundation to support the integration and scaling of AI-powered services to enhance the capabilities of one of our key products.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Develop and enhance editorial tools with new AI-powered features to support rapidly emerging business and project needs
* Collaborate with our newsrooms and internal product teams to understand their needs and integrate AI solutions effectively.
* Lead the extension initiative in the CMS, to assist newsrooms in achieving AI-related functionality, and promote the reusability of these solutions across different newsrooms where possible.
* Work closely with the central Schibsted Media teams responsible for Data & AI, ensuring alignment and the use of the best-suited central capabilities.
* Ensure application performance, uptime, and scalability, while maintaining high standards for code quality and application design.
* Work with agile development methodologies, adhering to best practices and pursuing continued learning opportunities.
* Participate in all aspects of agile software development, including design, implementation, and deployment.
* Integrate AI models into web applications, ensuring seamless operation and performance.
* Stay current with industry trends and advancements by reading articles, attending webinars, and experimenting with new tools and technologies.
* Experiment with new AI techniques and tools to enhance existing solutions.
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.


**About You**
* Proven experience in full stack development, with a strong focus on AI technologies. In-depth knowledge of technologies such as React, JavaScript/TypeScript, and Node.js.
* Familiarity with code management tools such as Git.
* Solid understanding and experience with AI and machine learning concepts and frameworks.
* Understanding of NLP techniques and libraries (e.g., NLTK, spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers) if working with text data.
* Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure, particularly their AI and machine learning services.
* Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and MLOps practices for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment of AI models.
* Ability to work autonomously and bring new perspectives to the team.
* Excellent team player with strong communication skills.
* Full professional proficiency in English.


**How To Apply**
 If you’re excited about the potential of AI and eager to be a part of transforming our editorial products, we’d love to hear from you! Please show your interest by August 16th.
   

  

 We will not start recruiting for the role until mid-August, as the hiring manager, Elias Nilsson, will be on vacation until then.

title: Product owner for Production core platform team- Solna/Hybrid
description:
*Are you passionate about driving change? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment where you can shape the future of logistics and want your parcel to be delivered? Look no further! PostNord, the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions in the Nordic region, is seeking a talented Product owner to join our transformation.*
**Join Us**
 As a Product Owner for the Production Core platform within our organization operating in the production area, you will be responsible for leading the development and enhancement of software solutions focused on managing the shared-service kafka platform, that is going to be used by many teams for exchange of events and orders. Your role will involve collaborating closely with stakeholders, teams, understanding business and the processes, and translating those requirements into a prioritized backlog for the development team. The goal is to ensure the delivery of high-quality, efficient and a stable kafka platform that meet the business and customer needs.
   

  

**Job Duties**
* Lead the Kafka Platform team to ensure seamless integration and operation of the Kafka infrastructure.
* Oversee the development, deployment, and maintenance of Kafka solutions, ensuring they meet business requirements and adhere to industry standards.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, architects, and business stakeholders, to drive the adoption and optimization of Kafka-based solutions.
* Define and prioritize the product backlog, ensuring alignment with the overall business strategy and goals.
* Monitor and report on the performance of the Kafka platform, implementing improvements and ensuring high availability and reliability.


 We are looking for you who have
   

  

 Need-to-have
   

  

* Proven experience as a Product Owner, Project Manager, or similar role in a technology-driven environment.
* Proactive and self-motivated.
* Strong leadership and team management skills.
* Ability to think strategically and make data-driven decisions.
* Adaptable and open to feedback
* In-depth knowledge of Kafka and its ecosystem, including experience with Kafka Streams, KSQL, and Kafka Connect.
* Strong understanding of data streaming, messaging systems, and real-time data processing.
* Experience with Agile methodologies and tools such as Jira or similar.


**Nice-to-have**
* Experience in the logistics or supply chain industry.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Knowledge of microservices architecture and containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Fluent in Swedish


 Knowledge requirement
   

  

* Certified product owner
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken.


 We offer you
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


 We make everyday life easier
   

  

 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com
   

  

 Apply
   

  

 We look forward to receive your application!
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns, please contact manager Carolina Lunde on: carolina.lunde@postnord.com
   

  

 Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: Union contact
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer (Python/React)
description:
**Senior Full-Stack Developer – Stockholm, Hybrid** 




 Are you passionate about building innovative software solutions for the energy sector in a consultancy environment? Want to play a key role in developing cutting-edge applications for a diverse client base, where you'll tackle complex data optimisation challenges and create impactful products across the full stack?
 



  





**What's in it for you?** 




 You'll join a dynamic team of software engineers and data scientists, specialising in custom product development for the energy industry. Your role will span both backend and frontend development (split about 80/20 towards the backend), allowing you to contribute across the entire stack.
 



  





 Enjoy a flexible hybrid work model, balancing office time in Stockholm with remote work. You'll engage in projects of various scales, collaborating with cross-functional teams and interfacing directly with clients to deliver tailored solutions.
 



  





 You’ll get a competitive salary offering up to 70,000 SEK per month (depending on your experience).They are committed to professional growth, with plans to offer clear paths to leadership roles as the company expands. With ambitious growth plans, there's potential for advancement to senior technical positions in the future. On top of this you’ll get 30 days vacation, a health and wellness allowance (friskvård) and private pension contribution.
 



  





**What you'd be doing?** 




 You'll typically work in agile teams of 5-6 people, sometimes scaling up for larger projects. You might spearhead new initiatives, assessing client needs and building your team from within the company.
 



  





 Your work will involve developing sophisticated data infrastructure, implementing machine learning components, and creating robust APIs. You'll use a modern tech stack including cloud services, containerisation, and message brokers.
 



  





 On the frontend, you'll craft user interfaces ranging from analytical dashboards to complex 3D visualisations, using cutting-edge web technologies to create responsive and data-rich applications.
 



  





**About you?** 




 You have at least 5 years of experience in full-stack development, with a strong backend focus, preferably in Python including frameworks such as FastAPI, Django, RabbitMQ & Kafka. On the frontend, they work with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React, so experience here would also be essential.
 



  





 You're passionate about clean, efficient code and stay current with emerging technologies. Adaptability is key, as you'll work across various domains and tech stacks.
 



 Experience with DevOps practices, cloud platforms and familiarity with data processing and machine learning tools is a plus.
 



  





 Consultant-style experience is beneficial, as client interaction is a significant part of the role and fluency in both Swedish and English is a must for effective client communication.
 



  





**A bit about them?** 




 A growing tech consultancy in Stockholm, specialising in software solutions for the energy sector. They partner with both established industry leaders and innovative startups, focusing on data-driven applications that promote sustainability.
 



  





 The company culture emphasises collaboration, continuous learning, and making a positive impact in the green tech space. They're seeking motivated individuals who can drive technical discussions and align with their mission to create meaningful solutions in the energy sector.
 



  





 With a current team of about 45 and plans for significant growth, this role offers an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of energy tech innovation in a rapidly expanding organization.
 



  





  





*Don't worry if your CV isn't up to date - just send me a message on LinkedIn or an email over to will@zebrapeople.com and we can go from there.* 




  





  





*3 stage Interview Process* 



1. *Initial Chat*
2. *Technical Discussion*
3. *Final with CEO*

title: Domain Architect Digital Workplace
description:
Are you ready to take charge of our digital workplace strategy? We are seeking a Domain Architect to shape the future of Lantmännen's digital workplace. This is an opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology in an innovative environment where your expertise in Microsoft 365, IT architecture, Generative AI and client security will be vital to our success.
   

  

**This Is What You Will Do**
 As a domain architect , you will be instrumental in developing and implementing Lantmännen's architecture principles within the digital workplace domain. Your primary focus will be on Microsoft-based workplace services such as SCCM/Intune, Windows 365 AD, Entra ID, Enterprise Mobility + Security , Purview and the M365 platform incl Microsoft Copilot . By participating in the Architecture Review Board, you will ensure that our principles, guidelines, and processes are consistently applied across all projects and solutions.
   

  

 Your role involves shaping the strategy for modernizing Lantmännen’s digital workplace and actively participating in initiating and supporting projects to achieve this vision . You will collaborate with various teams, fostering internal partnerships as we are growing into several related cloud services in parallel (Azure, Power Platform/BI, Dynamics etc ) . Keeping abreast of technological advancements and integrating relevant updates into our roadmaps will ensure our solutions remain current and effective.
   

  

 In addition, you will provide technical leadership , assisting our IT Solution specialists to comply with information security guidelines. You will document architectural views of existing and future solutions and plan the roadmap for our initiatives. By influencing stakeholders and driving consensus, you will work towards achieving desired outcomes and enhancing our digital workplace capabilities.
   

  

 You will be based in Stockholm or Malmö and report to the Digital Workplace Solutions Manager.
   

  

 This is what you need to succeed
   

  

 You have
   

  

* A broad IT background with an understanding of IT terminology and technical domains.
* At least 5 years of experience as a solution architect or a similar role within the digital workplace area.
* Deep knowledge and experience with Microsoft 365, including services such as SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive, as well as Windows 10/11, SCCM, Intune, Autopilot, EM+S and MS Purview. Competence within generative AI, IAM and IT security is an extra plus.
* An interest in new technology related to our domain and their business implications.
* Excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English.


**You Are**
* Team oriented and enjoys collaboration with others in your daily work.
* Communicative and skilled at building relationships with internal and external stakeholders.
* Strategic, and able to think long-term, aligning architectural decisions with the overall business strategy and goals.
* Innovative, and consistently seeks out new ideas and creative solutions to complex problems.
* A change leader, aware that technology needs to go hand in hand with communication, adoption and training to achieve new ways of working in the business.


 You share our values - Openness, Holistic view, Drive - and our promise of taking responsibility from Field to Fork.
   

  

**What We Can Offer**
 We are a large international group with diverse activities throughout the entire grain value chain, from the very sprout in the field to the food on our tables. With a wide range of businesses within food, agriculture, machinery, bioenergy and real estate, we offer career opportunities in every direction across industries, countries, companies and areas of expertise.
   

  

**Sounds interesting?**
 We hope so! You can apply for the position online until September 3rd. Please note that we are on vacation until August 8 th , so response times may be slightly longer than usual. We hope you also get the chance to rest and recharge during the summer, and we look forward to returning with renewed energy and continuing the recruitment process. Thank you for your patience!
   

  

 For a more objective and inclusive recruitment process, we do not accept cover letters but instead ask you to answer selection questions relevant to the position. The recruitment process includes both psychometric tests and competency-based interviews, aiming to promote a fair evaluation for all candidates. At Lantmännen, it is important that everyone has equal opportunities for employment and development within the company.
   

  

 If you have questions regarding the position or the recruitment process, please feel free to contact Matilda Olbin, Talent Acquisition Specialist at matilda.olbin@lantmannen.com. We look forward to your application!

title: Test automation engineer with interest in Complex Investigation | SEB, Solna
description:
Are you passionate about new technology and making a difference? Join our digital transformation!
   

  

 SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From COBOL to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Are you ready to take on a new challenge? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!
   

  

**About the role:**
 As test automation engineer in the Complex Investigation team, you’ll embark on an innovative journey in quality assurance and test automation.
   

  

 The team is developing and maintaining solution for Complex Investigation within Financial Crime Prevention to be able to detect bad actors.
   

  

 Your mission as a tester will be to assure quality in our delivery, both with manual testing and to design and implement automation using our self-developed framework, aligning with our overarching test strategy.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you have**
* Experience and devotion in testing with knowledge in test automation.
* A DevOps mindset and versatility in technical approaches.
* Proficiency in Java and experience with GitHub Actions and adequate CI/CD tools.
* Familiarity with OpenShift, Docker or Google Cloud will be an advantage.
* Analytical thinking and capability of untangling complex technical challenges.
* Openness to change and thrive on new technologies and continuous improvement.
* Proactivity as a team player who values collaboration and collective success.


 At SEB, you have great development opportunities, within a highly collaborative environment. The position is in Solna, Arenastaden. We embrace a hybrid work model, providing employees with eligible roles and tasks to work remotely up to two days a week.
   

  

**What we offer:**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment
* International opportunities and working environment
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2024-08-31. If you have questions about the position, please contact Ghazal Zabihi at ghazal.zabihi @seb.se. Please note that we are not able to handle applications via email due to GDPR.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**Be part of something bigger. Decode the future.**
 At Electrolux, as a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home.
   

  

**All about the role:**
 Our cloud-based, API-driven platform is the backbone for all our Software products which we deploy on worldwide markets. This is where we store data from appliances and users and build both generic and product specific functionality. We develop our own user experiences as well as together with third party developers. In this position we are looking for Senior Backend Developers who understand how to create a great modular, scalable and extendable architecture that serves both generic and application specific needs. We operate DevOps-style on both Microsoft Azure and AWS and we combine PaaS services, open source components and building our own modules depending on what solves the problem with the least complexity at the time.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Analyzing needs together with product managers, UX and other developers
* Participating in product design sessions with specific input on technical feasibility, scalability, extendibility, performance, and maintainability
* Designing and operating solutions using a suitable combination of Cloud-native PaaS services, open source components and implementation in mostly Java
* Participating in team activities including OKR’s, sprint planning, scrum stand-ups, demos and retros
* Taking active part in team improvements in process, tools, technology and communication
* Contributing to the product delivery through writing of the clean code according to set code style
* Designing and developing functional , unit , SIT tests
* Taking part in PR review sessions


**Who You Are**
* 3+ years of experience in developing systems in .Net or Java based (spring) products
* Strong experience in RESTful-services
* Experiences with a following SQL/NoSQL BDB’s (Experience with SQL BD’s, MongoDB, Redis, Kafka)
* Background in working with full-stack product centered teams
* Experience in working with geo-distributed teams
* Experiences of analytics instrumentation and analysis for micro- service based systems and cloud services (AWS on preferred)
* Ability to contribute with complexity, risk and effort analysis in backlog creation and management
* Ideally you come with previous experience from on-line business, IoT-products, API products, DevOps and/or Consumer products.
* You’re a Quick learner and energetic problem solver, enthusiastic about creating and improving ways of working
* You’re confident but without personal prestige as you thrive on cooperation, getting things done and user feedback
* Fluent English knowledge is a mandatory requirement


**Where you'll be:**
 This is a full-time position, based at our Global Headquarters in Stockholm (Sweden). You will be part of a dynamic international team where English is the natural language.
   

  

**Benefits highlights:**
* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment
* Discounts on our award-winning Electrolux products and services
* Family-friendly benefits
* Insurance policy plan
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path


**As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.**

title: Erfarna Projektledare inom infrastruktur, energi och industri till AFRY Project Management
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vi är samhällsbyggare som älskar att driva projekt. I Stockholm är vi idag drygt 180 drivna projekt- och byggledare. I vårt arbete leder vi bygg- och anläggningsprojekt med hela AFRY:s kompetens i ryggen.
   

  

 Project Management levererar projekt- och byggledningstjänster inom infrastruktur, energi och industri. Vi leder projekt genom hela processen, från projektutveckling till planeringsskedet, genom byggnadsfasen och vidare till driftskedet. Våra kunder finns såväl i offentlig sektor som i det privata näringslivet och finns inom statliga verk, kommuner, industri, energibolag och andra privata företag.
   

  

 AFRYs mission är att accelerera omställningen till ett hållbart samhälle och vi brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi arbetar med den industriella omvandlingen till förnyelsebar energi och ett hållbart samhälle. Som projektledare hjälper vi svensk industri att planera och utveckla fossilfria stålverk i norra Sverige, bygga framtidens batterifabriker samt förnyelsebar energi i form av vindkraftverk och solenergiparker. Vi arbetar självklart med de stora infrastrukturprojekten såväl som mindre stadsutvecklingsprojekt i kommuner. Vi vill nu förstärka oss inom dessa områden!
   

  

 I rollen som projektledare ansvarar du för att leda, driva och följa upp projekt hos kund. Rollen kan variera inom infrastruktur, industri eller energi inom enskilda projekt till större långsiktigt multidisciplinära projekt, med nytänkande helhetslösningar. Hos oss får du följa projekten från projektutveckling till byggnation och uppföljning. Arbetet innebär stor frihet och stort ansvar tillsammans med kunniga kollegor. Du styr det gemensamma arbetet i samarbete med beställaren och projektgruppen mot projektets övergripande mål. Du rapporterar i projektet till beställaren samt eventuell styrgrupp.
   

  

 AFRY Project Management i Stockholm samarbetar i team och kompetensutvecklar varandra genom ömsesidigt erfarenhetsutbyte. Med hållbara lösningar i fokus och genom vårt arbetssätt utmanar vi traditionella idéer och att tänka utanför ramarna. Vi strävar efter att öka kvalitén och värdet för våra kunder och att göra skillnad för vårt samhälle och branschen i stort.
   

  

 Det finns ett stort behov av vår kompetens, inom exploatering och stadsutveckling men också inom omställningen till förnyelsebar industri och energi. Vi behöver därför rekrytera och förstärka oss inom dessa områden med placering i Solna, Liljeholmen eller Uppsala.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som vill vara en del av AFRYs framgångssaga! Vi tror att du har väl utvecklade ledaregenskaper tillsammans med en affärsorienterad ledarstil och god kommunikativ förmåga. Du har ett stort intresse av att utveckla såväl människor som projekt och att bidra med din erfarenhet till vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Vi ser att du har flera och gärna 10 års erfarenhet av projektledning inom samhällsbyggnad, bygg och anläggning eller motsvarande inom industri- eller energibranschen. Du har varit framgångsrik och känner dig nu redo att axla lite större projekt. Vi tror att du har en bakgrund som beställare, konsult eller entreprenör. Erfarenhet av projekteringsledning är meriterande.
   

  

 Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet från projekt med hållbarhetsprofil såsom hållbar kravställning i upphandling, cirkulära materialflöden i byggprojekt. Alternativt att du brinner för området och skulle önska att få arbeta med detta
   

  

 I grunden har du högskole- eller civilingenjörsexamen med relevant inriktning alternativt annan högre utbildning som bedöms likvärdig och passar för uppgiften.
   

  

 Som person drivs du av personlig utveckling, är engagerad i ditt arbete och gillar att samarbeta för att nå bästa resultat. Du är social och naturligt affärs- och kundfokuserad och ser möjligheter att göra affärer inom området.
   

  

 Svenska språket måste kunna hanteras flytande i tal och skrift (Swedish language must be handled fluently in speaking and writing).
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Du får en möjlighet att påverka samhällsbyggandet och den tekniska utvecklingen i branschen genom samarbete för att hitta de bästa lösningarna. Vi erbjuder dig nya karriärmöjligheter och kompetensutveckling på en modern arbetsplats med utmanande arbetsuppgifter och spännande projekt världen över.
   

  

 Vi som arbetar på AFRY drivs av samhällsutveckling och arbetar aktivt med att främja jämställdhet, jämlikhet och mångfald, vilket vi vet kommer göra oss ännu starkare, mer produktiva och framgångsrika. AFRY har rekryterat nästan 1000 nyanlända ingenjörer som förstärker vår organisation. Vår målsättning är att vara 50% kvinnor i Market Area Civil år 2025.
   

  

 AFRY är rankat som en av Sveriges mest populära arbetsgivare bland ingenjörer. Hos oss är du med och utvecklar innovativa och hållbara lösningar inom infrastruktur, energi och industri. Just nu söker vi marknadens vassaste kompetenser som tillsammans med oss vill skapa framtidens samhälle. Vi hoppas också att du kommer lära dig lika mycket av oss som vi kommer göra av dig.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig karriärmöjligheter på en modern arbetsplats med utmanande arbetsuppgifter och spännande projekt världen över. Vi vet att medarbetare som mår bra, både fysiskt som psykiskt, är den viktigaste framgångsfaktorn. Därför fokuserar vi på säker arbetsmiljö och balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi vill att du ska ha en vardag som fungerar - hinna lämna, hämta, träna, handla eller bara sova lite längre på morgonen.
   

  

 Genom Club AFRY främjar vi vår kultur som bygger på passion och lagspel. Vi erbjuder roliga fritidsaktiviteter tillsammans med våra härliga kollegor!
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag är den 11 augusti. Urval sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

**Kontaktuppgifter för frågor:**
 Sara Zhouson
   

  

 Section Manager Civil Stockholm Uppsala
   

  

 +46 10 505 56 47
   

  

 Sara.zhouson@afry.com
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.
   

  

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Senior Principal Software Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $200,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, gt.school. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Are you a seasoned software engineer with a deep interest in AI? Trilogy is on the lookout for exceptional engineers to lead the charge in adopting generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products.
   

  

 Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
   

  

* TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
* Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
* TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
* Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.


 Your role will focus on integrating AI into engineering practices, using AI tools to increase efficiency and solve engineering tasks like coding and testing. Based on the obtained results, you will derive recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team. Maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams will be a key part of your work.
   

  

 You will be an integral part of our existing engineering team, working collaboratively on our suite of products to deeply understand our environment and needs. You will have the freedom to propose and experiment with new tools and then will leverage the insights and experiences obtained to evolve our processes, advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup.
   

  

 We seek candidates with a strong background in software engineering and a capacity for adapting to new technologies. Moreover, an interest in the latest generative AI developments and a drive for innovation are crucial. While our primary tech stack is AWS Serverless with TypeScript, we're looking for versatile engineers who can excel in a variety of technical environments and challenges.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Developing fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality.
* Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting.
* Documenting best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Building new AI models from scratch; instead, your focus will be on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency.
* Being confined to outdated technologies; we encourage an environment that thrives on dynamic tech stacks, fostering continuous innovation.


**Senior Principal Software Engineer Key Responsibilities**
* Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity.


**Basic Requirements**
* Minimum 5 years of experience in professional software development.
* Minimum 3 years either as a lead engineer reviewing the work of other engineers or as an architect making important technical decisions.
* Excited to use and explore new generative AI tools for software engineering tasks on a day-to-day basis


**About Gt.school**
 GT School is an EdTech Startup that leverages technology, AI, and subject matter experts to cultivate a new way of learning. Our unique approach leverages 50+ years of learning science, cutting-edge data analytics and high-performance coaching. In doing so, we can help students learn more, learn faster, and learn better - and have fun while doing it. We are a remote-first company that hires globally via Crossover.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $100 USD/hour, which equates to $200,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

title: SW and Electronics Test Engineer
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **3+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

 **Assignment Description**


Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking a Software and Electronics Test Engineer. The In-house SW & Test team, which focuses on Side & Roof – Door, Locking, and Alarm functions, needs to strengthen their team with this role.

**Main Responsibilities:**

* Conduct test analysis, test planning, and define test methods as part of a dedicated team.
* Write and execute tests across all abstraction layers in the V-model.
* Plan features and stories within the In-house SW and Test team, focusing on door, locking, and alarm functions for verification and validation.
* Perform fault tracing and administrative trace and coverage analysis on component nodes, system designs, and complete vehicle functions.
* Work with various test infrastructures and assets, including HIL, SIL, and VIL environments.
* Conduct real-life testing on test tracks or roads using test or released vehicles.
* Develop the next generation of door, locking, and alarm functionalities while enhancing current solutions.
* Address quality issues, implement running changes, and manage model year updates.
* Ensure proficiency in electronics and hardware testing, as the product includes both software and hardware components.
* Deliver work according to specified acceptance criteria and definitions.

**Qualifications:**

* Master of Science in electronics, mechatronics, applied physics, or a related field.
* Swedish B-driver’s license.
* Knowledge and understanding of reading electrical schematics and using instruments such as voltmeters, oscilloscopes, signal generators, etc.
* Experience in the automotive industry.
* Experience in automated verification of system design and software.
* Preferred experience with the following tools: Elektra, Canalyzer/Canoe, Inca, DSA, CarConfig, CarCom.
* Experience with test automation tools, e.g., Vector hardware & software.

**Desired Attributes:**

* Passion for quality and customer satisfaction.
* Enthusiasm for new technologies, software and hardware testing, and creating great user experiences.
* Positive and easy-going mindset.
* Progressive attitude and a love for continuous improvement.
* Team-oriented.
* Curiosity and a strong self-driven approach.
* Strong communication skills, both written and spoken, to explain complex issues.
* Fluent in English; Swedish is a merit.

**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

description:

Rollbeskrivning:

 **Assignment Description**


Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking a System Integrator & Verification Engineer for Ultrasonics.

**Main Responsibilities:**

* **Integration of Ultrasonic Components**: Integrate ultrasonic sensors into the host AUTOSAR ECU, ensuring seamless functionality. This includes managing and optimizing for network and CPU load, and addressing latency and timing issues effectively.
* **Verification**: Conduct comprehensive verification of the ultrasonic sensors at various levels, including component, system, and in-vehicle testing.
* **Test Automation Management**: Develop and manage automated test systems to streamline the verification process and ensure consistent quality.
* **System Development Insight**: Maintain a comprehensive understanding of the entire system development process, recognizing and addressing interdependencies to ensure optimal performance.

**Qualifications:**

* Degree is not relevant if you can demonstrate a driven personality and technical competency.
* Hold a European B driving license.

**Desired Attributes:**

* **Lifelong Learner**: Demonstrate that you are a lifelong learner, proactively seeking information to improve work efficiency. Team members are expected to constantly help each other, step out of specific role-related tasks, and prioritize what leads to the team’s success, including coaching, supporting, and sharing development information and tasks.
* **Engaged and Driven**: Have a proactive and driving personality, capable of taking charge and closing topics effectively.
* **Interdisciplinary Interest**: Enjoy working in a dynamic and interdisciplinary technology field, contributing to a collaborative and innovative environment.

**Additional Qualifications:**

* Experience with AUTOSAR ECUs.
* Experience in generating ARXMLs for BSW & RTE configurations and integration from the AUTOSAR tool chain.
* Knowledge of software development and integration processes, including Continuous Integration tools and methods (Jenkins, CI/CD, Gerrit).
* Knowledge of classic and adaptive AUTOSAR.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. (Mandatory)
* Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.
* Experience in ultrasonic sensor technology is a plus.


Note that not all additional qualifications are mandated as prerequisites. It is essential that there is a willingness to learn the aforementioned experiences and skills.

description:

 **Assignment Description**


Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking a Senior Software & Data Analysis Engineer specializing in Software Download.


Our client envisions a future where our friends, families, and children are transported in a personal, sustainable, and safe way. They build self-driving, fully electric, connected, and safe cars. They are now looking for curious, creative individuals who want to be part of their development journey through innovative thinking.

**What They Offer:**

* Membership in an agile development team with great team spirit, the Software Download (SWDL) team.
* Responsibility for designing and verifying generic Software Download technologies within our client’s organization.
* Integration within the agile release train Base Technology Solutions (BTS), which supports all electronic control units in the entire electrical system.
* Working according to the SAFe framework with 12-week program increments.

**Main Responsibilities:**

* Get inspired by our client’s mission to provide their customers with a better car experience every day.
* Use your deep knowledge to test and enhance the SWDL technologies in the vehicle and surrounding systems.


Your main responsibilities, together with the team, include:

* Working with SWDL system testing activities and test automation, including updating test cases, methods, strategies, tools, and processes.
* Sharing knowledge with implementation teams, suppliers, verification teams, manufacturing engineering, aftermarket, and the IT department.
* Supporting the SWDL technology development for the complete SWDL system and electronic control units (ECU) regarding both software and hardware.

**Qualifications:**

* M.Sc. or B.Sc. degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent.
* Experienced with agile development and familiar with software development best practices.
* Knowledge of Vector CAPL script (C-based programming).
* Experience in software development (Python) for enabling automation.
* Experience with automated software testing/Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery.
* Knowledge of distributed electrical systems and electrical architecture.
* Experience with test tools such as Wireshark and Canalyzer/CANoe.

**Preferred Skills and Qualifications:**

* ISTQB Certification.
* Experience in SWDL/bootloader development, diagnostics, and Ethernet communication.
* Experience with VIDA and VCATS tools.
* Hands-on knowledge about writing automated test cases on higher test levels.
* Experience in embedded software development (C++).
* Basic knowledge in base tech areas: Diagnostics, SWDL, OTA, NM, Network Communications.
* Swedish driver’s license (B).
* Experience with Zuul CI tool.

**Desired Attributes:**

* Enjoy learning from others and sharing your knowledge with colleagues.
* Flexible and have excellent communication and documentation skills in English.
* Positive attitude and team player.

description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 2**+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

 **Assignment Description**


Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking an experienced component design engineer to be part of their Exterior Camera sensor team.


In our client’s department within Safe Vehicle Automation, there are around 120 ambitious and highly skilled engineers creating tomorrow’s platform solutions for their active safety and self-driving vehicles. Their Agile Release Train (ART) Autonomous Drive & Advanced Driver Assistance System Platform develops the complete sensor and software platform for functions such as collision avoidance, automatic parking, and autonomous driving. Included in their responsibility is the design and verification of state-of-the-art LiDARs, ultrasonic sensors, cameras, and radars.

**Responsibilities:**

* Participate as a curious and open-minded team player with a ”bring-it-on” mindset in the agile development team.
* Define, guide, and integrate the Camera sensor mechanically and electrically into the vehicles.
* Work closely with the team, suppliers, and other stakeholders to create different concepts and prototypes.
* Verify concepts and prototypes before continuing to develop the final solution towards production intent.

**Qualifications:**

* 2-5 years of experience in automotive sensor integration.
* Knowledge of Camera or Vision systems.
* A minimum of a bachelor’s degree in electronics, mechatronics, robotics, or similar fields.
* Proven hands-on experience in developing automotive sensors or Camera sensor/systems from other industries.
* Understanding of sensor performance, time, cost, and quality optimization.
* Knowledge of modern materials and manufacturing processes.
* Driver’s license (B, valid in the EU).

**Desired Attributes:**

* Passionate about self-driving vehicles and dedicated to enhancing the perception function for these vehicles.
* Driven, structured, and resourceful team player.
* Ability to deliver the ”how” and ”what” in a dynamic, multidisciplinary, and multicultural environment.
* Skilled in managing complexity and uniting engineers to impact the product.
* Excellent communication skills and proficiency in English, both verbally and in writing.

title: Automotive Software Verification Engineer
description:
**For our client we are looking for a Automotive Software Verification Engineer. To fit for this role we believe you are a Verification Engineer who wants to contribute to energy efficient propulsion. You will belong to a group who work in virtual, rig and vehicle environments and are responsible for system, function and SW dimension. Our client uses Vector HIL both for component SW testing and integrated to actual thermal system in rig environment. They use rig testing for understanding component and system behavior. Your role will be to work in rig- and vehicle testing within Thermal Management. You need to have experience from testing, be skilled in scripting and interested in improving workflow to fit this position.**


### **Required Skills**


* BSc within mechanical, mechatronic, electrical or electronics and solid experience within testing.
* University degree on BSc or MSc within mechatronic, electrical or electronics, working experience within relevant field.
* Have solid experience from testing in rig and vehicle, preferably using INCA and CANOE.
* Good knowledge in scripting using Python to automatize running of rigs and postprocessing of results.
* Competence and interest in working with workflow around testing.
* Simulink, Target link, DSA experience is meritorious.
* Fluent in English.

  


**Preferred Skills**


* Driving license BE and T2/T3 is meritorious.
* Understanding of Continuous integration tools such as GIT, Gerrit and SVN is meritorious.
* Experience from SW development and System design within automotive is meritorious .

title: Camera Hardware & Component Engineer
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 2+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Assignment Description
  
Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking an experienced component design engineer to be part of their Exterior Camera sensor team.
  
In our client’s department within Safe Vehicle Automation, there are around 120 ambitious and highly skilled engineers creating tomorrow’s platform solutions for their active safety and self-driving vehicles. Their Agile Release Train (ART) Autonomous Drive & Advanced Driver Assistance System Platform develops the complete sensor and software platform for functions such as collision avoidance, automatic parking, and autonomous driving. Included in their responsibility is the design and verification of state-of-the-art LiDARs, ultrasonic sensors, cameras, and radars.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Participate as a curious and open-minded team player with a ”bring-it-on” mindset in the agile development team.
  
Define, guide, and integrate the Camera sensor mechanically and electrically into the vehicles.
  
Work closely with the team, suppliers, and other stakeholders to create different concepts and prototypes.
  
Verify concepts and prototypes before continuing to develop the final solution towards production intent.
  
  

**Qualifications:**  

2-5 years of experience in automotive sensor integration.
  
Knowledge of Camera or Vision systems.
  
A minimum of a bachelor’s degree in electronics, mechatronics, robotics, or similar fields.
  
Proven hands-on experience in developing automotive sensors or Camera sensor/systems from other industries.
  
Understanding of sensor performance, time, cost, and quality optimization.
  
Knowledge of modern materials and manufacturing processes.
  
Driver’s license (B, valid in the EU).
  
  

**Desired Attributes:**  

Passionate about self-driving vehicles and dedicated to enhancing the perception function for these vehicles.
  
Driven, structured, and resourceful team player.
  
Ability to deliver the ”how” and ”what” in a dynamic, multidisciplinary, and multicultural environment.
  
Skilled in managing complexity and uniting engineers to impact the product.
  
Excellent communication skills and proficiency in English, both verbally and in writing.

description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 3+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
  

Assignment Description
  
Our client in the automotive industry is currently seeking a Software and Electronics Test Engineer. The In-house SW & Test team, which focuses on Side & Roof – Door, Locking, and Alarm functions, needs to strengthen their team with this role.
  
  

**Main Responsibilities:**  

Conduct test analysis, test planning, and define test methods as part of a dedicated team.
  
Write and execute tests across all abstraction layers in the V-model.
  
Plan features and stories within the In-house SW and Test team, focusing on door, locking, and alarm functions for verification and validation.
  
Perform fault tracing and administrative trace and coverage analysis on component nodes, system designs, and complete vehicle functions.
  
Work with various test infrastructures and assets, including HIL, SIL, and VIL environments.
  
Conduct real-life testing on test tracks or roads using test or released vehicles.
  
Develop the next generation of door, locking, and alarm functionalities while enhancing current solutions.
  
Address quality issues, implement running changes, and manage model year updates.
  
Ensure proficiency in electronics and hardware testing, as the product includes both software and hardware components.
  
Deliver work according to specified acceptance criteria and definitions.
  
  

**Qualifications:**  

Master of Science in electronics, mechatronics, applied physics, or a related field.
  
Swedish B-driver’s license.
  
Knowledge and understanding of reading electrical schematics and using instruments such as voltmeters, oscilloscopes, signal generators, etc.
  
Experience in the automotive industry.
  
Experience in automated verification of system design and software.
  
**Preferred experience with the following tools:** Elektra, Canalyzer/Canoe, Inca, DSA, CarConfig, CarCom.
  
Experience with test automation tools, e.g., Vector hardware & software.
  
  

**Desired Attributes:**  

Passion for quality and customer satisfaction.
  
Enthusiasm for new technologies, software and hardware testing, and creating great user experiences.
  
Positive and easy-going mindset.
  
Progressive attitude and a love for continuous improvement.
  
Team-oriented.
  
Curiosity and a strong self-driven approach.
  
Strong communication skills, both written and spoken, to explain complex issues.
  
Fluent in English; Swedish is a merit.

They are now looking for curious, creative individuals who want to be part of their development journey through innovative thinking.

 Vi på Sogeti Stockholm erbjuder intressanta och utvecklande uppdrag hos kunder inom många olika branscher.
   

  

 Som java-utvecklare får du vara med och bygga nya system från grunden, vidareutveckla och underhålla redan befintliga system med hjälp av modern teknik.
   

  

**Vi söker dig med**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av java-utveckling.
* Erfarenhet av Spring Framework, Spring Boot och Microservices.
* Förståelse för API utveckling och integration.
* Erfarenhet inom CI/CD tooling och container technologier. (Docker/Kubernetes)
* Goda kunskaper i svenska då vi har en nära dialog med våra kunder.

* Att arbeta i agila leveransteam.
* Kafka och databas teknologier.
* Redhat Linux.
* Molnteknologier (AWS eller Azure).

 Vi tror att du är en person som brinner för problemlösning och utveckling samt har förmågan att samarbeta i team. Din förmåga att både inspirera och bli inspirerad av andra visar på din flexibilitet och förmåga att anpassa dig till förändringar. Sist men inte minst så tror vi att du besitter en god förmåga att skapa förtroende och ta ansvar i kundrelationer samt för den teknik vi använder.
   

  

**Men här på Sogeti handlar det inte bara om vad du redan kan!**
